titles.title: To redesignate the Department of the Navy as the Department of the Navy and Marine Corps.
To redesignate the Department of the Navy as the Department of the Navy and Marine Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill redesignates: (1) the Department of the Navy as the Department of the Navy and Marine Corps, and (2) the Secretary of the Navy as the Secretary of the Navy and Marine Corps. The bill makes similar redesignations with respect to the Department Under Secretary, the Department Assistant Secretaries, and the General Counsel.
